# Changelog

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/),
and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html).

## [1.0.0] - 2025-12-07

### Added

- Initial release
- `AirspotAdvertisement` class for parsing BLE advertisement data
- Support for 6-byte manufacturer-specific data format
- Parsing of CO2, battery level, reading mode, and status flags
- Example scanner script
- Unit tests
- GitHub Actions CI/CD workflow

### Documentation

- README with usage examples
- API reference documentation
- Advertisement data format specification
